tasks.task: Gather supplies for installing a solar irrigation system
subtasks: Research and select appropriate solar panels
Determine number and size of solar panels needed
Choose between surface and submersible pumps for water source
Consider battery backup for energy storage
Select piping or drip irrigation system for water distribution
Find a sunny location for solar panels with minimal shading
Securely mount solar panels with proper mounting brackets
Wire solar panels in series or parallel configuration
Install solar-powered pump near water source, ensuring stability
Connect pump to water source and ensure proper piping connections
Link pump to solar panels or battery system for power
Test irrigation system, check for leaks, and adjust as needed
Regularly maintain solar panels, pump, piping, and other components

tasks.task: Prepare tools and equipment before installation
subtasks: Check tool kit for necessary items
Assemble components for solar panels, pump, and irrigation system

tasks.task: Install solar irrigation system on a farm
subtasks: Select the right components based on farm needs
Demonstrate clarity in system setup and operation
Highlight the environmental benefits and cost savings of solar irrigation

tasks.task: Gather supplies for installing a solar irrigation system. Then, under this task, there are several subtasks involved:
Prepare tools and equipment before installation. Checking tool kit and assembling components.
Gather supplies for installing a solar irrigation system.
Prepare tools and equipment for installation.
